title: Jigsaw
description: A collection of ten short stories which first appeared on Julie Howlin's writing blog.Including - a jigsaw that does itself; Dungeons and Dragons characters playing a game set in our world, two Christmas stories, a new year story, A Tabitha Drake story (set some years before the Tabitha Drake novels take place), what happens when two losers in love decide to keep a pact that they would marry each other if they hadn't met the perfect partner by forty, a creepy Easter story, a spooky story set in a ski chalet and a creepy tale about a garden gnome.
author: Julie S. Howlin
